description: After completing this Project, you can change your specialization to "Fanatic".\n\nFanatics devote their lives to serving the gods. From dusk until dawn, these magi toil away at a neverending list of demands to better serve each of the 30 gods of Rodia. Such devotion is not without purpose, however, for the Fanatic is able to call on the gods' power to serve him in his time of need.
name: Specialization: Fanatic
